content.question:
A change in which of the following can affect the long-run economic growth of a country?
I. The quantity and quality of a countryâ€™s labor force 
II. Technology 
III. Spending on capital goods

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
